page.title: 09 The Regent Centre
page.content: The{Regent Centre}got its name from the {Regent Murray}who was shot at {Linlithgow Cross}on the 20th January 1570.During the 2nd World War this area was a factory owned by ICI and was used for the making of ammunition The{Regent Centre}of today is a modern shopping complex and was built 1981-1983.The first shop opened was Wm. Lows in June 1983.Other shops followed,{R.S.McColls, City Bakeries, {Freezways}and the newest-{Haddows Off {Sales. } We found that before the Centre was built most people travelled to shop. Now that it is built it saves money for travelling.{Wm Lows}is the most popular place for shopping in Linlithgow.We also found that older people tended to use the {Regent {Centre}as it was more convenient.
